Construx Solutions Named One of CIO’s 20 Most Promising Tech Solution Providers
Atlanta, GA (October 14, 2015) – Construx Solutions Inc., a national construction consulting and technology firm, was recently awarded a spot on CIO Review’s list of the 20 Most Promising Tech Solutions Providers of 2015.
The 20 Most Promising Tech Solutions list highlights companies who fulfill the desperate need for cost-effective and flexible solutions that help companies navigate the complex construction industry. Selected out of a pool of 300 tech solution providers, Construx Solutions was awarded a spot on this prestigious list on the recommendation of a distinguished panel of CEOs, CIOs, VXCs, analysts and the CIO Review editorial board. The award highlights and recognizes the company’s cloud-based SmartPM software, which provides data management and analysis to commercial construction projects worldwide.
“The Construx team is proud to have our SmartPM software recognized and applauded for its ability to revolutionize the construction industry and support construction companies in ways never seen before,” said Michael A. Pink, founder of Construx Solutions.
SmartPM is an online, cloud-based solution that is designed to capture and store real time (actual) project data for construction projects. This data is fed directly from the field via a very simple and straightforward daily reporting app. From there the system analyzes the data in order to identify problem areas that are causing, or will likely cause, impacts to the project budget and schedule throughout the project life cycle. At the end of the day, users will have all the information they need to understand, with certainty, where every extra dollar was spent and why it happened.
About Construx Solutions, INC.
Headquartered in Atlanta, Georgia, Construx solutions, INC. is a nationwide construction solutions firm offering consulting services and software to construction firms large and small. A leader in its field, Construx Solutions developed the revolutionary SmartPM software.
To learn more about SmartPM or request a free demo, visit Construx Solutions online at http://www.construxsolutions.com/ or by calling (404) 329-3000.
